answerText: concentration[10]  Dividing the molarity by the equivalence factor gives this quantity, another form of chemical concentration.
heading: MUT |2015 | 7 | 15 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: When molar terms are used, this quantity is known as molarity. [10] Name this term from chemistry that denotes the amount of a particular constituent per unit volume of a mixture.
